title: A team of plats, gold and silver are looking for a top player for Clash.
body: We are looking for a top player, preferably silver or higher, to join us this Saturday in Clash. If you know you have a temper in league, please don't put your name in the pot. We play to have fun.

replies.body:
Hi, I am a G4 top main with a decent champion pool. I used to main Irelia and can play Sion, Gnar, Mord, Kennen at a decent level.
ign is Sisters10086.
